No matter what Yeritte says, Jon Snow knows a few things. The bastard son of Ned Stark (or is he?) grew up in a house-hold where he was welcomed by Ned and his half-siblings but not so much by Catelyn Stark. When the opportunity came to join the Nights Watch at Castle Black, he saw
